name: Payday Power
overview:
Payday Power is a broker of same day payday loans in the UK and is a trading name of Reset Finance.

Payday loans are small loans, between Â£50 and Â£1000 which are then repaid on your payday.

A great advantage of payday loans is that they are one of the easiest types of loans to get. You can simply apply online and have money deposited into your account on the same day. All you need is to be over 18, employed and take home more than Â£500 a month and have a bank with a valid debit card. You are then expected to repay your loan on your next payday, although it is possible to defer repayment to the following month.
